verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: may] soon claim as much as $ 1.7 billion penalty from ZTE Corp. , according to people familiar with the matter .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] [ARGM-MOD: may] [ARGM-TMP: soon] [V: claim] [ARG1: as much as $ 1.7 billion penalty] [ARG2: from ZTE Corp.] , [ARGM-ADV: according to people familiar with the matter] .
The Trump administration may soon claim as much as $ 1.7 billion penalty from ZTE Corp. , [V: according] to people familiar with the matter .
